title: Attack on Titan
notes: Incredible series with amazing plot twists and character development. The animation and music are top-tier.

title: Death Note
notes: Masterpiece psychological thriller. Light and L's cat-and-mouse game is brilliant.

title: Your Name
notes: Beautiful movie with stunning animation and emotional story.

title: Demon Slayer
notes: Great animation and fight scenes. Tanjiro is a likeable protagonist.

title: Spirited Away
notes: Studio Ghibli masterpiece. Incredible world-building and imagination.

title: One Piece
notes: Epic adventure with great character development. Long but worth it.

title: Jujutsu Kaisen
notes: Modern shounen with great animation and interesting curse system.

title: Hunter x Hunter
notes: Amazing series but taking a break. Will finish soon.

title: Princess Mononoke
notes: Another Ghibli film on my watchlist.

title: Cowboy Bebop
notes: Classic but didn't click with me. Might retry later.

title: Naruto
notes: Classic shounen that got me into anime. Great character development.

title: My Hero Academia
notes: Solid superhero anime with good world-building.
